It's an unhinged one," said Jim Cantiello about the entertaining, unpredictable shenanigans pulled out by Steven Tyler in the first two nights of audition episodes this week. Truth be told, I never realized how much I missed Paula[ Abdul] last year. Steven Tyler 's colorful language, zany metaphors and deafening jangly man-jewelry was just the entertaining wild card the two-night premiere needed to give it a must-see facelift. Jim Cantiello was glad that the new trio, which also includes sole returning judge Randy Jackson, didn"t fall into the same old "mean Simon Cowell " and "too-nice Paula" tropes. Steve Ballmer , Microsoft CEO. Ecosystems thrive when fueled by speed, innovation and scale. The partnership announced today provides incredible scale, vast expertise in hardware and software innovation and a proven ability to execute. Key elements of the partnership announced Friday by Nokia and Microsoft are: Bing will power Nokia's search services across Nokia devices and services, giving customers access to Bing's next generation search capabilities.
